duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish and foster strong working relationships with ongoing and potential referral sources.
Perform patient assessment and clinical review of potential admissions.
Understand rehabilitation diagnoses and clinical indicators to make appropriate decisions for admission.
Maintain working knowledge of insurance authorization and benefit requirements for rehabilitation admissions.
Facilitate ongoing communication with patient/family to prepare for admission.
Facilitate ongoing communication with patient/family to prepare for admission.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree preferred RN, PT,OT,SLP, LPN degree required CRRN or CCM certification preferred Valid driver’s license and ability to travel between hospitals 3-5 years clinical experience in hospital or Post-Acute setting; preferred experience as a Clinical Liaison or Case Manager Self-motivated with excellent time management skills; and be able to work both collaboratively and independently.
